definition: The past participle form of a verb that indicates the completion of an action related to consuming food. It is commonly used to describe the act of having eaten a meal or food item.

examples.german: Ich habe gestern Abend Pizza gegessen.
Sie hat den ganzen Kuchen gegessen.
Er hat nichts gegessen, weil er krank war.
examples.english: He didn't eat anything because he was sick.
